name: Cave Bots V0.2
description:
A Pizza eating Cave Man found himself in a cave with Robots... He's Out Of Place !

Hard Parkour  First  Person Action Game :) 

*Made in 3 Days for The Completion Jam (Theme : Out Of Place)

WASD  : Movement  -    Left Click  : Attack 

Space  :  Jump              -     Escape : Pause Menu

Level Design & Enemy Model made by My Friend Zak 

Music : https://mixkit.co/

SFX : https://www.zapsplat.com/
